dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Tanaka, Hayato
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Video_S2
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: MPEG video clip of the mating behaviour of Parapolycope spiralis (Ostracoda). Stage 2: male (right side) clasps female (left side) and maintains the mating position by the endopodite, endopodite claw, and exopodite of the antenna.
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:provenance: Made available in DSpace on 2013-02-19T19:43:29Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 Video_S2.mpg: 9127660 bytes, checksum: 91cb85df59f42a054c167887886d85f1 (MD5)
